## KnowledgeBaseHighlight interface

Description of a highlighted word, which is relevant to the original knowledge base search.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface KnowledgeBaseHighlight 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [beginOffset](./stentor-models.knowledgebasehighlight.beginoffset.md) | number | Starting offset within the document |
|  [endOffset](./stentor-models.knowledgebasehighlight.endoffset.md) | number | End location of the highlight within the document |
|  [topAnswer?](./stentor-models.knowledgebasehighlight.topanswer.md) | boolean | <i>(Optional)</i> If the highlight is the top suggested answer for the entire search.<!-- -->A document can contain the answer while the highlight pinpoints it's location within the document.<!-- -->When this is true, it will show up as a suggested answer in the results. |
